text: Kreuzlingen is a district of the canton of Thurgau in Switzerland. The capital city is Kreuzlingen. It contains the following municipalities: Municipality Population (31 Dec 2005) Area, km² Altnau 1913 6.7 Bottighofen 1937 2.4 Ermatingen 2606 10.4 Gottlieben 327 0.4 Güttingen 1357 9.5 Kemmental 2137 28.4 Kreuzlingen 17,583 11.5 Langrickenbach 1070 10.9 Lengwil 1239 8.9 Münsterlingen 2459 5.4 Tägerwilen 3579 11.6 Wäldi 955 12.3 Total 37,162 118.4 Category:Kreuzlingen District
title: Kreuzlingen District
